title: Italy wins first Moody’s upgrade since 2002
description:
Rome: Italy has achieved its first upgrade from Moody’s Ratings in more than 23 years, a victory for Premier Giorgia Meloni that ends an era when the country teetered at the brink of “junk”.

The lowest credit score for any Group of Seven economy was lifted by one notch to Baa2, according to a state...
